headline: PPL Corporation announces upcoming retirement of Executive Vice President and COO Fran Sullivan and corresponding organizational changes
summary: ALLENTOWN, Pa., Jan. 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- PPL Corporation today announced the elimination of its Chief Operating Officer role effective April 4, at which time current EVP and COO Francis X....
